title: Provides that the return of certain children to the care and custody of the parent, parents or guardian shall be done pursuant to a transition plan
summary: Provides that the return of a child who has been in the care and custody of a social services official for a period of six months or more without visitation by the parent, parents or guardian shall be returned to the care and custody of the parent, parents or guardian pursuant to a transition plan.
